main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Austin, Texas, on January 3, 1960, initially perceived as a bright light and later identified as Venus.
interesting points: The object was observed first through a telescope, which showed it as a bright light moving slightly before becoming stationary,The object had a capsule shape when viewed,It was described as larger than a normal star with a spectrum of colors varying in brightness,The observation lasted between 40 minutes to 1 hour,The report noted the object became hidden by clouds at one point.
sighted object: bright light, later identified as Venus
witness description: a civilian administrative supervisor for an electronic firm, 41 years old, retired Air Force aircraft gunner
